name: Kungfu Warriors 3D Free
description:
Kungfu Warriors 3D is amazing Fighting game between different Warriors from different Kungfu Training Schools. Are you Ready for a Fight.

Features
-Amazing Kungfu Fight Game for everyone.
-Do you like fighting Games, then this game is surely for you.
-Various Different Warriors for you to select in the Game.
-5 Stages for you to play in the full version
-Difficulty Level is different for Different Warriors.
-Use of Special Effects in the Game.
-Difficulty Level is different for different warrior.
-Fully Tested on iPhone 4,4s,5,5c,5s,6,6 Plus & iPad (All)

Note: You can upgrade to Full version to Unlock all the stages. You can also unlock various warriors through in-app purchase.
